data.title: Vimla Patel

data.text:
Appointments

Current

Senior Research Scientist, Cognitive Studies in Medicine and Public Health, The New York Academy of Medicine, New York, NY

Professor (Adjunct)

Department of Biomedical Informatics, Columbia University, New York, NY

Population Health Sciences, Health Informatics, Weill Cornell College of Medicine, New York, NY
